user_query: I want to purchase some outdoor equipment for a team building event and get suggestions, prices, customer feedback, product details, and categories from AliExpress.

TaskList.description: Search for popular outdoor products available on AliExpress.
Retrieve prices for the outdoor products found in Step 1.
Gather customer feedback for the outdoor products using their product IDs.
Collect additional product details such as specifications and images for each product.
Organize and compile the information from Steps 1-4 into a comprehensive report.
